# A Uniformly Bounded Correlation Function for Spatial Point Patterns

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A function to compute the local correlation function for spatial point patterns, that measure of the degree of clustering in a point pattern and has a bounded and interpretable scale.

## Installation

You can install the development version of lcfstat from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EvgeniyaMartynova/lcfstat")
```

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:
